authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
description: She recently overcame the relationship hurdle of introducing her new beau, Bachelorette star Dave Billsborrow to her friends and family.
title: Sarah-Mae Amey flaunts her curves in a black bikini... after introducing new beau Dave Billsborrow to her family and friends on the Gold Coast
title_page: Sarah-Mae Amey flaunts her curves in a black bikini... after introducing new beau Dave Billsborrow to her family and friends on the Gold Coast | Daily Mail Online
text:
She recently overcame the relationship hurdle of introducing her new beau, Dave Billsborrow, to her friends and family.
And now, with any nail-biting safely in the past, The Bachelor's Sarah-Mae Amey has been able to relax and enjoy her holiday in Noosa, Queensland.
Taking to Instagram on Monday, the brunette shared a carefree snap of herself looking sensational in a plunging black bikini by designer Sammy And T.
Scroll down for video
Showing some skin! Sarah-Mae Louise flaunted her curves in a black bikini in an Instagram snap uploaded on Monday
Wearing minimal makeup, Sarah-Mae flaunted her bronzed complexion and petite frame as she posed next to a sandstone wall surrounded by foliage.
Fans were quick to shower the florist with compliments, with one begging her to reveal the secrets behind her physique.
Sarah-Mae responded obligingly, saying: 'I try to do as many 45min spin/cycle classes as I can, heaps of greens & fish/salmon, not too much dairy or bread.. Oh & lemon in hot water every morning for sure Xx.'
His turn! Sarah-Mae introduced beau Dave Billsborrow to her family and friends on the Gold Coast this week. They are seen here with her goddaughter
Days earlier, she accompanied Dave in his first meeting with her brood, who are based in the Gold Coast suburb of Coolangatta.
On Sunday, the brown-eyed stunner documented the momentous occasion, taking to Instagram with a photo of herself nestled into Dave's chest while holding her young goddaughter.
'Loved being home with all my beautiful family and friends', she wrote in the caption, before adding: '#AmeliaMadelaine turns 2. Yesterday we celebrated my baby goddaughter's 2nd Birthday.
Girls' night! She also shared pictures of herself catching up with her girlfriends for a night out while in the area
'Loved being home with all my beautiful family & friends, even if it was for only 24 hours. Back to Noosa we go,' she gushed.
She also shared pictures of herself catching up with her girlfriends for a night out while in the area.
The enamoured duo's trip to the Gold Coast followed a trip to Darwin, in which Sarah-Mae met Dave's relatives over Christmas.
